org.svvrl.goal.core.io
Class AbstractAltAutomatonCodec

java.lang.Object
  org.svvrl.goal.core.io.XMLCodec
      org.svvrl.goal.core.io.AutomatonCodec
          org.svvrl.goal.core.io.AbstractAltAutomatonCodec
All Implemented Interfaces:
Codec
Direct Known Subclasses:
AltAutomatonCodec, TwoWayAltAutomatonCodec
public abstract class AbstractAltAutomatonCodec
extends AutomatonCodec

An AbstractAltAutomatonCodec can encode an automaton with alternation in GOAL file format (GFF) and decode a GFF file back to an alternating automaton. This codec is part of GFFCodec and has no name, file extension, and description.

Author:
Ming-Hsien Tsai
